2.10.4 Cyclones

Chennai, situated on the Eastern Coast of India witnesses cyclones regularly. It has
witnessed seven major cyclones from 2005 to 2012. The impacts of these cyclones
have been detailed out in Table 2.3. The most vulnerable areas to cyclone extend to
a distance of 20 Kilometres from the coast. The following are the major risks
associated with a cyclone in the city:

o cyclonic wind velocities combined with the heavy storm;

o coastal flooding due to high waves.

o flooding due to heavy storms.
